message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies2013.pdf: Página 45
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
45 
HEURISTIC 1. MEREOLOGY REUSE I 
Heuristic 1 (mereology reuse I). We should reuse an implemented mereology if the conjunction of the 
following conditions is satisfied: (CM1) the CQ refers to a relation R that establishes an order; and (CM2) R 
fulfils the weak supplementation principle.  
 
Sant Cugat del Vallès (the location of 
Pharmacia Iberia ® headquarters) is 
(located) in the province of 
Barcelona 
The hydroxyl group is 
(structural) part of 
paracetamol. 
Nitrating phenol is 
(involved) in 
synthesizing 
paracetamol 
A small bottle is 
(contained) in its box. 
C. Keet, A. Artale, Representing and reasoning over a taxonomy of part–whole relations, Applied 
Ontology 3 (2008) 91–110.
speaker: SYSTEM
